body: Do I have to have a clean infractions list inorder to become staff, I dont want to apply its just a question that popped in my head
body_tagged: Do I have to have a clean infractions list inorder to become staff, I dont want to apply its just a question that popped in my head
title: A clean infractions list

replies.body: I think you either have to have no infractions or minimal infractions, so like 1 or 2 not 10 pages worth
replies.body_tagged: I think you either have to have no infractions or minimal infractions, so like 1 or 2 not 10 pages worth

replies.body:
You can have infractions to become staff. Just you got to look back on your infractions and try to do better.

Hopefully, ppl will notice.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Hmm .... no EricV4 had 3 pages got temp banned
replies.body_tagged: Hmm .... no EricV4 had 3 pages got temp banned

reply_to.body: Hmm .... no EricV4 had 3 pages got temp banned
reply_to.body_tagged: Hmm .... no EricV4 had 3 pages got temp banned

replies.body: Oh sorry I thought you meant perm ban
replies.body_tagged: Oh sorry I thought you meant perm ban

replies.body:
You are free to apply for staff when apps re-open regardless of how many infractions you have.

However, if the Senior Staff think that you would cause problems, you won't get accepted.

Also, there is no set page limit of when you are punished for excessive infractions, it depends on the severity of the punishments, the time interval between them, and how many of a certain type there is (multiple tempbans could be a perma, multiple kicks could be a tempban)
replies.body_tagged:
